modName: Gatti Queens Blade Collection for CBBEv3
summary: The MOD is pakaged my 'Queens Blade' armor mods.
descriptionHtml:
Gatti Queens Blade Collection for CBBEv3
--------------------------------------------------------------
I am not good at English.
So enough support is not possible, please understand it.

The MOD is pakaged follow mods to 1 esp include mesh,texture. all in one pack.
There are designed by 'Queens Blade' siries.

1) Gatti 05 Annelotte (Heavy armor)
2) Gatti 06 Branwen (Light Armor)
3) Gatti 07 Siggy (Light Armor)
4) Gatti 08 Irma (Light Armor)
5) Gatti 09 Reina (Light&Heavy Armor)
6) Gatti 10 Risty (Light Armor) & MorningStar (onehanded mace)
7) Gatti 11 Lunaluna (Light Armor)

And add follow armor.
1) Gatti 08 Irma black version. (Light Armor)
2) Gatti 05 Annelotte light version. (Light Armor)

*Visual and recipe has not changed. Armor rating adjust a little.
*Not support weight slider, only one size.

*All item craftable.
Annelotte : Steel category. Required 'Advanced Armor' peek.
Branwen : Studded category.
Siggy : Leather category. And amulet is jewel category.
Irma : Hide category.
Reina : Studded category.
Risty : Studded category. And morningstar is Steel category.
Lunaluna : Elven category. Required 'Elven Smithing' peek.

*CAUTION*
1) All item are different from my present mod's items. (because different esp)
For this reason, if my present mods replace to this mod, your items is LOST, and craft again.
2) Meshes and textures and the filepaths are not changed.
if you customized it, backup the file before install this mod.

---------------------------------------------------------------
Required
Caliente for Caliente's Body Mod - Big Bottom Edition v3

---------------------------------------------------------------
History
V1.2 Add Lunaluna Armor
V1.1 Fix problem : Body skin specular parameter was less than naked body.
V1.0 Release.

---------------------------------------------------------------
Credit
Thanks to

Body based on 'Caliente for Caliente's Body Mod - Big Bottom Edition v3'
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Annelotte shield based on 'A Steel Heater Shield by Abakus'
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5916
author: Gatti
